description.es: Una aventura emocionante siguiendo a un niño en su primer día de clases, conociendo nuevos amigos y descubriendo el maravilloso mundo de la escuela.
description.en: An exciting adventure following a child on their first day of school, meeting new friends and discovering the wonderful world of school.

styleProfile.technique: digital watercolor illustration with soft, flowing brush strokes and gentle color transitions
styleProfile.colorPalette: warm and inviting pastel tones - soft blues, gentle pinks, cream yellows, mint greens with warm beige backgrounds
styleProfile.lineWork: minimal subtle outlines in soft brown or gray, emphasis on color blocking and blending rather than hard lines
styleProfile.texture: visible watercolor paper texture with wet-on-wet bleeding effects, organic paint splatters, and natural color gradients
styleProfile.lighting: soft diffused natural lighting from upper-left creating gentle shadows, warm sunlight ambiance with subtle highlights on faces
styleProfile.detailLevel: simplified stylized backgrounds with loose gestural elements, highly detailed and expressive character faces with careful attention to eyes and smiles
styleProfile.atmosphere: dreamy, warm, optimistic and nurturing - capturing the wonder and excitement of childhood experiences
styleProfile.artisticReferences: modern children's book illustration combining traditional watercolor aesthetics with digital precision, similar to contemporary picture book artists

metadata.sceneDescription: Llegando a la escuela con mochila, listo para el primer día
En el aula, conociendo al maestro y compañeros
Participando en actividades de clase, aprendiendo y divirtiéndose
Jugando en el recreo con nuevos amigos
Regresando a casa feliz, contando las aventuras del día
